schedule: Fort Lauderdale – Great Inagua – San Juan
circumstances: En route from Fort Lauderdale to San Juan via Great Inagua, the airplane crashed into the Sargasso Sea in unknown circumstances. There was no distress call sent by the pilot en route. SAR operations were conducted but eventually suspended few days later as no trace of the aircraft nor both occupants was found.
probable_cause: Due to lack of evidences, the exact cause of the accident could not be determined.
